participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and overwhelmed, Jake often feels trapped in his current life circumstances and struggles with his career and personal relationships.
participant_1.background: i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman.

participant_2.name: Mabel
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, Mabel finds joy in simple pleasures and has a deep love for creativity, especially in baking and crafting.
participant_2.background: knitting is my passion. i am scared of dying. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i love to bake cookies.
